name: predict idc in breast cancer histology images
description: Step 1 Import Modules Step 2 Explore Data Step 3 Preprocess Data Create a new directory CREATE FOLDERS INSIDE THE BASE DIRECTORY create a path to base_dir to which we will join the names of the new folders train_dir val_dir CREATE FOLDERS INSIDE THE TRAIN VALIDATION AND TEST FOLDERS Inside each folder we create seperate folders for each class create new folders inside train_dir create new folders inside val_dir print x print x Image to be used as query dimensions of our images load the model we saved predicting images.
script: Flatten sklearn.metrics keras.preprocessing.image glob cross_val_score Adadelta sklearn.naive_bayes sklearn.tree keras.layers keras.callbacks sklearn.discriminant_analysis model_from_json scipy.misc EarlyStopping Dropout Sequential MaxPool2D KNeighborsClassifier SGD Path Adam DecisionTreeClassifier imread keras.utils.np_utils Conv2D Adagrad seaborn numpy LinearSVC pathlib learning_curve matplotlib.pylab ReduceLROnPlateau GradientBoostingClassifier imresize sklearn.ensemble ModelCheckpoint sklearn sklearn.model_selection confusion_matrix KFold RandomForestClassifier ImageDataGenerator LinearDiscriminantAnalysis image RMSprop Activation Dense pandas keras.optimizers MaxPooling2D LogisticRegression accuracy_score to_categorical BatchNormalization Callback load_model plotImage keras.preprocessing GridSearchCV model_selection sklearn.neighbors sklearn.linear_model StratifiedKFold GaussianNB sklearn.svm SVC backend keras backend as K keras.models train_test_split make_scorer
